Some features

 Fast

Real time update. No need to wait for third parties updating its servers data. It uses fresh data at each and every moment!

 Easy

As easy as one tap to find out who unfriended you! Or to track your new friends if you prefer!

 Convenient

Clean and intuitive interface! Large buttons, pull to refresh and all the information in just one place!

 Safe

All-time history is stored and sync with iCloud! All your iOS devices will be connected to the same data.
